title: Expansion of networks and spread of concepts

content.prompt: The expansion of communication and trade networks in Afro-Eurasia from 600 C.E. to 1450 C.E. resulted in the spread of which of the following from South Asia?

choices.label: Military weaponry, such as iron-tipped spears and chariots
Technological and scientific concepts, such as the decimal and zero
Textile manufacturing processes, such as the spinning jenny

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World
